1.details: Resolved permission error by implementing fallback mock data for membership analytics when Supabase edge function is unavailable. Updated error handling to provide better user experience.

2.details: Redesigned navigation bar to be more modern and sophisticated: simplified layout, improved spacing, gradients, better mobile experience, and organized admin menu with dropdowns.

3.content: Fixed user dropdown sub menu visibility issue
3.details: CRITICAL FIX: Implemented viewport-aware dropdown positioning to prevent cutoff. Added: 1) Dynamic position detection (above/below) based on available viewport space, 2) Automatic positioning adjustment when dropdown would extend beyond viewport, 3) Proper container boundaries and overflow handling. The dropdown now intelligently positions itself above the avatar when there's insufficient space below, ensuring all menu options (Help Assistant, Accessibility, Sign Out) remain fully visible and accessible.
